channel.title: News - Polish Foreign Policy
channel.description: News articles related to Polish Foreign Policy

item.title: Poland Supports Ukraine's NATO Bid
item.description: Polish Minister Jacek Siewiera advocates for Ukraine's NATO membership, seeing it as a long-term process requiring allies' unity.

item.title: Biejat Calls for Defense Exclusion in Presidential Campaign
item.description: Presidential candidate Biejat urges fellow candidates to avoid discussing defense and armaments during the campaign.

item.title: Poland Supports Ukraine's NATO Membership
item.description: Polish Minister Jacek Siewiera advocates for Ukraine's NATO membership but acknowledges it's a lengthy process requiring allies' unity. Expects a ceasefire by 2025.

item.title: Polish Soldiers Join Polish Community for Christmas Eve in Bosnia
item.description: Soldiers of PKW EUFOR celebrated Christmas Eve with the Polish community in Bosnia and Herzegovina.

item.title: Sikorski Meets Diplomats for Christmas
item.description: Poland's top diplomat Rados≈Çaw Sikorski met with diplomatic mission heads and the Apostolic Nuncio for a Christmas gathering.

item.title: Poland-Morocco: Exploring New Cooperation
item.description: Poland's focus on Eastern Europe should expand to include Morocco for strategic cooperation.
